bug.author: hzxie
bug.description: The developers change API every release!! I cannot find "compute_point_cloud_to_point_cloud_distance" anymore. SO ANGRY!!!!!

comments.comment: BTW, the search function in the docs page is not working at all!! <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1730504/73711347-7fc0a780-4741-11ea-812f-6937cd9d3d9e.png></denchmark-link>
Thanks mate for the posting the solution. This should probably be put in the documentation?

Moved to "http://www.open3d.org/docs/0.8.0/python_api/open3d.geometry.PointCloud.html" since 0.8.0.
I don't know clearly what do u mean. How can I use such function again?
